meanings.sent1: The monster in the movie was uglier than I expected.
meanings.sent2: The rotten fruit looked uglier as it started to decay.
meanings.sent3: The clown's attempt at a serious face only made him look uglier.
meanings.sent4: The dark storm clouds made the sky look uglier than ever before.
meanings.sent5: The graffiti on the wall made the neighborhood look uglier and more rundown.

meanings.sent1: Her old car was uglier than her friend's shiny new one.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house on the corner was uglier than the rest of the street.
meanings.sent3: The cake she baked turned out uglier than a mud pie.
meanings.sent4: The argument between the siblings made the situation uglier than before.
meanings.sent5: The old bridge was getting uglier with each passing year.
